MAN.TITLE: binomial

DESCRIPTION.P: pr=binomial(p,n) return a binomial probability vector. pr(k) = probability (X=k) , with X=B(n,p) i.e the probability of k success in n independent trials, (p = proba. of one success). pr(k) = C(n,k) p^k (1-p)^(n-k) with C(n,k)= n!/(k!(n-k)!) = prod(1:n)/(prod(1:k)*prod(1:n-k)).
